front.title: LISP control-plane for Identifier Locator Addressing (ILA)

abstract.t: This document specifies how to use the LISP control-plane to support an Identifier Locator Addressing (ILA) data-plane. In particular, it describes how ILA data-plane components can use the LISP control- plane to dynamically resolve and register Identifier-to-Locator mappings as well as Endpoint Address to Identifier/Locator mappings.
